description: This Dart file defines a theming class `AppTheme` for a Flutter application, including color palette and theme data for light mode.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing static methods and constants to define and generate a custom theme for the app.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Generates and returns a `ThemeData` object configured with custom color scheme, font styles, and widget themes for light mode.
